com.core.adnsdk

Class AdCustom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.core.adnsdk.AdCustom

  • public class AdCustom
extends java.lang.Object
    AdCustom is used to create Banner, Card views. Default renderer view type is AdViewType.CARD_VIDEO.

    User can also use AdView to create Banner, Card views instead.

    It would load another ad when current ad was watched by default, it could be disabled by setReloadAd(boolean).

    If isReloadAd() is disabled, it would not load another ad when current ad was watched by default, user could use AdListener.onAdWatched() callback to notify SDK to load another ad when current ad was watched.

    Since:
    2015-09-01
    See Also:
    AdView
